text: Very nice and happy place to be, the teachers make them so welcoming that they enjoy coming to school. The activities for kids n parents are always there.. interaction for every event is just amazing! Keep up the good work team n teachers

Great to know more about the curriculum and activities conducted. Teachers answer my queries. My child is new and adapt well
Thank you teachers
Very good effort from the teachers to share the progress of my child. Parents get to experience interesting activities during the session.

I am incredibly impressed with the nurturing environment and dedicated staff at Kidz Meadow, especially Teacher Afiqah. My son has flourished under her care, and I am grateful for the attention she gives to developing not just academic skills but also his social and emotional resilience. The preschool provides a safe and stimulating atmosphere where children are encouraged to explore and learn through play, which has significantly boosted my son’s confidence. I highly recommend Kidz Meadow to any parent looking for a place where their child’s growth and development are truly prioritized.

The school have been a safe place for all my children. Thanks to all teachers for the time and effort for making them learned knowledge, engaged & entertained. The school activities, learning journeys have been great thus far. Looking forward to more joy and fun for the kids.
